title: Data Type Navigator
description: Create a program that takes in a user's input and determines the data type of the input. The program should be able to differentiate between integers, floats, and strings. If the input is an integer or a float, the program should print out the data type and the value. If the input is a string, the program should check if the string can be converted into an integer or a float, and print out the converted value and its data type if possible.
